name: Fungal Sconces
description: A series of delicate, glowing fungi have taken root on the walls, providing a soft, ethereal light that seems to pulse with a gentle, blue-green energy. As you touch one of the fungi, it releases a shower of sparkling spores that dance in the air before disappearing into the darkness.

name: Shattered Crystal
description: A large, crystal formation lies shattered on the floor, its fragments reflecting the eerie glow of the fungal sconces. As you examine the crystal more closely, you begin to notice a series of intricate, swirling patterns etched into its surface - patterns that seem to match the symbols on the walls of the Chamber of Whispers.
